root: ^"That was close. It looks like they got a bit of your hair, huh? No worries, sweetie. It grows back."

c-0: ^"A long time ago, Prophets used their witchcraft to bring the dead back. But they couldn't control their powers and now here we are...trapped for eternity."
^"I keep telling you, your only chance is to get out before sunrise. Otherwise, we are going to be BFF's."
